item.title: Equipping / Emotes / PNPC

@server_dude wrote:

[code]if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == 4202 == true)
{
startAnimation(214);
npcId = 1698;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == 4202 == false)
{

isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} [/code]

something like this

Read full topic

item.title: Equipping / Emotes / PNPC
item.dc:creator: @Snark Snark
item.description:
@Snark wrote:

In my server, ive been working on a ring that does multitude of actions.

My plans for this ring are:

When equipped. The ring will start an emote and then it will change the user into a ghost, and then enable the user to noclip. The code im using is something like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == 4202 == true)
	{
             startAnimation(214);
	npcId = 1698;
	isNpc = true;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}

The 2 main problems im encountering are…

  1. When the emote is performed, it is repeated over and over and over again. Is it possible to change the code so the emote is performed when the ring is worn, and is only performed once?

  2. I need the code for noclip? And where would I put this.

Read full topic
